title: Pope Francis Accepts Resignation Of Conservative African Cardinal
content:
1. Pope Francis Accepts Resignation Of Conservative African Cardinal  NPR
  2. Pope Francis Removes Conservative African Cardinal From Vatican Post  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Francis accepts resignation of Cardinal Sarah, head of Vatican worship office  National Catholic Reporter
  4. Pope Francis accepts the resignation of Cardinal Sarah as prefect of the Congregation for Divine Worship  America Magazine
  5. Cardinal Robert Sarah, who often clashed with pope, resigns  New York Daily News
